programme.title: BLACKPINK House
programme.desc: BLACKPINK is preparing a special surprise fan meeting for BLINK. They come up with a plan to prepare macarons for their fans, but it turns out to be more difficult than expected. Will they successfully finish preparing on time? Watch to find out!

programme.title: BLACKPINK House
programme.desc: One very special fan is selected as BLACKPINK prepares for a surprise event for her. Then they prepare to fly to Thailand, Lisa's home country, for a well-deserved vacation. On their first day in Bangkok, they explore the city's delicious food and flea market.

programme.title: Shining SOLO
programme.sub-title: Shining SOLO: Episode.09 BE WITH YOU
programme.desc: The men find themselves in three vehicles with the women's choices determining who will spend the day alone or with a companion.The anticipation mounts for the choices that will define this heart-fluttering Secret Day.
